lead_paragraph: The South Korean phone maker posted a steep decline in profit during the first quarter, and analysts say it lost high-end market share to Apple.

headline.print_headline: Samsung Counts on S6 to Revive Its Mobile Business
headline.main: Samsung Counts on S6 to Revive Its Mobile Business

snippet: The South Korean phone maker posted a steep decline in profit during the first quarter, and analysts say it lost high-end market share to Apple.
